mapper.select: select room_id as id, (select m.content from chat_message m where m.msg_id=(select max(msg_id) from chat_message m where r.room_id = m.room_id)) as lastcontent, to_char((select max(send_time) from chat_message m where m.room_id=r.room_id), 'MM/DD') sendtime, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT seller FROM chat_room r2 WHERE r.room_id = r2.room_id AND r2.seller = #{userId}), r.buyer, r.seller), null) receiverid, (select count(*) from chat_message m where m.room_id=r.room_id and m.read_check='N' and m.sender!=#{userId}) unreadcount, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT seller FROM chat_room r2 WHERE r.room_id = r2.room_id AND r2.seller = #{userId}), (SELECT hh_user.nick_name FROM hh_user WHERE hh_user.id = r.buyer), (SELECT hh_user.nick_name FROM hh_user WHERE hh_user.id = r.seller)), null) receivernickname, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT seller FROM chat_room r2 WHERE r.room_id = r2.room_id AND r2.seller = #{userId}), (SELECT hh_user.profile_img FROM hh_user WHERE hh_user.id = r.buyer), (SELECT hh_user.profile_img FROM hh_user WHERE hh_user.id = r.seller)), null) receiverimg, (select max(msg_id) as max_message_no from chat_message m where r.room_id = m.room_id) as maxmessageno from chat_room r where seller=#{userId} or buyer=#{userId} order by maxmessageno desc nulls last

select COALESCE(NVL((SELECT product_seq from sell_product s where r.sell_seq=s.product_seq) ,(SELECT product_seq from auc_product a where r.auc_seq=a.product_seq)) ,null) AS productSeq, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT product_seq from sell_product s where r.sell_seq=s.product_seq) ,'sell', 'auction') , null) AS productType, COALESCE(NVL((SELECT img_name from img_files i where r.sell_seq=i.table_pk and i.img_cate_seq=2 and rownum=1), (SELECT img_name from img_files i where r.auc_seq=i.table_pk and i.img_cate_seq=3 and rownum=1)), null) AS productImg, coalesce(nvl2((select sell_seq from chat_room r2 where r2.room_id=r.room_id), (SELECT product_price from sell_product s where r.sell_seq=s.product_seq), (SELECT max(bid_price) from auction_history a where r.auc_seq=a.auc_prod_seq)),null) as productPrice, coalesce(nvl2((select sell_seq from chat_room r2 where r2.room_id=r.room_id), (SELECT ARTICLE_TITLE from sell_product s where r.sell_seq=s.product_seq), (SELECT auction_TITLE from auc_product a where r.auc_seq=a.product_seq)),null) as productName, coalesce(nvl2((select sell_seq from chat_room r2 where r2.room_id=r.room_id), (SELECT STATUS from pay_history p where r.sell_seq=p.sell_seq and r.buyer=p.buyer_id), (SELECT STATUS from pay_history p where r.auc_seq=p.auc_seq and r.buyer=p.buyer_id)),null) as payStatus, NVL((select pro_status from sell_product s where r.sell_seq=s.product_seq), null) AS sellProStatus, NVL((select deal from sell_product s where r.sell_seq=s.product_seq), null) AS dealStatus, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT seller from chat_room r2 where r2.room_id=r.room_id and r2.seller=#{loginUserId}), '판매자', '구매자'), null) AS status from chat_room r where r.room_id=#{chatRoomId}
select msg_id msgId, content, to_char(send_time,'HH24:MI') as sendTime, read_check as readCheck, sender from chat_message m where m.room_id=#{chatRoomId} order by msgId
